title: How to Make a Coconut Milk Pudding

steps.headline: Boil milk with agar or gelatin powder and desiccated coconut powder.
Once the milk, agar powder and coconut mixture starts to boil, remove from stove.
Add cardamom, sugar, and condensed milk and mix gently.
Cool slightly and then add cream into mixture.
Mix well using a rotary beater or electric beater.
Spoon into tall glasses or bowls and allow to set in fridge.
Leave for an hour until the dessert sets.
Garnish with shredded pistachios, edible silver beads, etc., (optional).

text: Boil milk with agar or gelatin powder and desiccated coconut powder.  Once the milk, agar powder and coconut mixture starts to boil, remove from stove.  Add cardamom, sugar, and condensed milk and mix gently.  Cool slightly and then add cream into mixture.  Mix well using a rotary beater or electric beater.  Spoon into tall glasses or bowls and allow to set in fridge.  Leave for an hour until the dessert sets.  Garnish with shredded pistachios, edible silver beads, etc., (optional).  Finished.
